title: Chicken Parmentier
description: Try using up leftover roast chicken in this tasty potato-topped pie.For this recipe you will need a 20x30cm/8x12in ovenproof dish.
ingredients: 1.5kg/3lb 5oz floury potatoes, such as King Edwards, peeled
6 large or 8 small shallots, peeled and halved
4 large ripe tomatoes, peeled and chopped (or 1 x 400g tin chopped plum tomatoes)
600g/1lb 5oz cooked chicken meat (from a roast or rotisserie chicken), shredded
